main event: A metallic, disc-shaped craft was observed at high altitude in Charleston, West Virginia for approximately 2 minutes.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 2 minutes, The craft was described as metallic and disc-shaped, The height of the craft was estimated to be around 10,000 feet, The sighting was conducted in clear weather but with light haze, It was suggested that the sighting may have been a light-controlled fire from the Union Carbide Chemical Plant.
witness description: chemical machine operator at Union Carbide Corporation
